summary: ClansSection component was added and wired into App.tsx and TopNav.tsx with smooth scrolling. However, the clan description texts do not have evidence of matching the user-provided verbatim descriptions, and the required sigil image assets themselves are not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each clan block displays the exact corresponding description text from the user request (verbatim, including punctuation).
missing_requirements.reason: The new ClansSection hardcodes clan descriptions, but there is no evidence these strings match the exact user-provided descriptions verbatim (the BuildRequest requires exact provided text).

missing_requirements.requirement: Use generated static assets stored under frontend/public/assets/generated for the seven sigil images.
missing_requirements.reason: The component references /assets/generated/*.png paths, but the diff summary shows no added files under frontend/public/assets/generated (no PNG assets were added/modified in the provided diff summary).
